title: "You Have Left A Game In Progress"
body:
After winning a ranked game and clicking the "continue" button, my client wasn't loading the game's stats, so I proceeded to just skip the stats and queue up again.  After having to close my client, I reopened it and the client stated that I had left a game and gave the option to reconnect.  Seeing as I had not joined another game afterwards, this seemed fishy.  I had a friend try to spectate the game while I attempted to reconnect to a nonexistent match.  Nothing loaded other than a black screen.  A friend of mine, who was duoing with me during this match, is also experiencing the exact same problem.  Please help, I don't want to lose any LP!  

Thanks,
Becquerrel

( screenshot of friend's client: http://puu.sh/rg2fC.jpg )

replies.body:
This typically happens if the server doesn't properly report the results of the match. These are pretty rare, and we refer to them as a "Ghost Game". They shouldn't last longer than a few hours. Unfortunately, due to the nature of these situations, they may not record the LP gain/loss for the match, and in your instance, it sounds like this happened as well. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Hey I have this problem too. I was in the same game and now I can't play another. I have the win on video: See win at 2:24:50 https://www.twitch.tv/coderchick/v/90115653 Please see the end of my twitch video. I won the game and then it crashed while it got stuck on "Waiting for Stats". When I logged back out and then back in, I cannot start another game because the server thinks I'm still in the game. I DIDN'T GET ANY LP FOR MY WIN. Please see screenshot. http://i.imgur.com/aGghJAD.jpg http://i.imgur.com/7CujTkh.png I also filed a ticket to support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/23365793

I found a temporary solution- I had my girlfriend log into my account from her computer, and it seemed to reset the "in game" status of my account.  However, the match that had glitched my client was never recorded.
